entry.title: Can you travel with Medical Marijuana?
entry.summary: Traveling with marijuana can be risky, although those risks can be lessened with a medical marijuana card. Now that thirty-eight states have legalized some form of medical cannabis, there are ways to get around the federal law when flying and driving to other locations within the United States. entry.title: Congress Set to Hold Marijuana Hearing Next Week following Mid-term Elections
entry.summary: Lawmakers in the House of Representatives will hold a hearing next week to discuss marijuana reform issues at the federal and state levels. This critical meeting is set to have bipartisan support and participation. Is Marijuana Still Federally Illegal? Yes.
